function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased promotion of antimicrobial additions in building products","Impact":"Does not guarantee healthier conditions and may harm humans and the environment","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough research on the impact of antimicrobial additives and consider alternative strategies for improving indoor air quality","Technologies":"Air purification systems, natural ventilation, and non-toxic building materials","People":"Occupants of buildings with antimicrobial additives","Owner":"Architects, building designers, and construction companies"},{"Description":"Negative psychological effects of quarantine on mental health","Impact":"Fear of infection, financial crisis, boredom, and decrease in physical activity","Mitigation":"Implement mental health support programs, provide access to outdoor spaces, and promote virtual socializing and recreational activities","Technologies":"Virtual communication platforms, mental health apps, and community engagement tools","People":"Individuals in quarantine","Owner":"Health organizations, local governments, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Decreased greenery in urban environments","Impact":"Reduced availability of physical and relaxation activities in a natural environment, and increased risk of various pathologies","Mitigation":"Implement green infrastructure projects, create green spaces in urban areas, and encourage nature-friendly building designs","Technologies":"Green roofs, urban gardening, and sustainable landscaping","People":"Residents of urban areas","Owner":"City planners, environmental organizations, and urban developers"}]}
